name: The Devil's Garden
description: Can you escape The Devil's Garden?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64 bit) Processor: Intel i3 4160 / AMD A-4000 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 720 (2 GB) / Radeon r7 250 (2 GB) or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space Sound Card: 5.1
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel i7 6700k / AMD FX8350 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB) / Radeon r7 370 (4 GB) or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 20 GB available space Sound Card: 5.1
